overview: On a peaceful, pre-war winter in Czechoslovakia, the genial godfather, Jaroslav Haschek, of Vera Hascheck, presents the young girl with her first pair of ice skates. Soon, she astonished the warm-hearted people of her village with her skill, and she is acclaimed a marvel-on-ice.
tagline: Glittering with gay musical scenes! Glistening with brilliant spectacles! Gleaming with romantic gaiety!
title: Lake Placid Serenade
